timeline.message: Support custom context root for OpenAPI endpoint in MP
Work around config collision that Tomas found

timeline.bodyText:
You should not use the  CONFIG_PREFIX - the config should be on the node of openapi. Microprofile component configuring this class should request that node before calling this method.
The method should be called config - that is the rule for any builder in any Helidon component.
timeline.author: tomas-langer
